1.Title: Lucky Constitution
1.Description: Yuzuha regains 30 Energy when she enters the battlefield. In Investigation Zone Mode, this effect can trigger at most once every 180s. Enemies in the <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state have their All-Attribute RES reduced by 10%. The Attribute Anomaly DMG and <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG buff from her <color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color> is increased to 130% of its original value.
1.Lore:
"Ugh, I'm done for!"
"Yuzuha, you failed too? ...Hold up, a 92?! Are you seriously telling me you guessed your way to that score? You're just showing off!"
"No, seriously! Luck only works if you don't overdo it. I had no reason to get such a high score on this one... I can feel it — there's no way the next test will have multiple choice!"

2.Title: Full of Colorful Company
2.Description: When Yuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert, Right Now!</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Surrender or Suffer the Mischief</color> hits an enemy, all squad members' DMG increases by 15% and Anomaly Buildup Rate by 15%, lasting 40s and repeated triggers reset the duration. When a heavy attack hits an enemy that is not Stunned, it will trigger a forced <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> triggered this way have reduced Interrupt Level and forced <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> can only occur once every 20s. Whenever another character enters through a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, Yuzuha gains 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>. Yuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot</color> cooldown is reduced by 25%.
2.Lore:
"Kama, you've never left my sight, but how did you swap so many things like just like that?"
"Heh heh~ Kama's got a lot of friends too! Come on out, everyone! Let me introduce them — left to right: Takenosuke, Inosuke, Hyakunosuke..."
"Wait, you're going too fast!"
"Okay, one more time: Shinnosuke, Kinosuke, Harunosuke..."
"Those names are completely different!"

3.Title: Fairytale of the Haunted City
3.Lore:
"...The princess led a busy life. At sunrise, her silent and stoic maids would adorn her with lavish garments, a weighty magical crown, and layers of jewelry before guiding her to the throne where she used her powers to turn mundane stones into priceless gems."
"Does the princess really have to turn stones into gems every single day? That sounds even more boring than doing homework while minding the shop."
"Well... if she doesn't, the poor kingdom will collapse."
"If a kingdom can only survive by overworking the princess, then let it collapse!"
She bursts into laughter. Yes — let such a useless kingdom fall.

4.Title: Falling Magic
4.Description: The DMG of Yuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: We Have Cookies</color> increases by 30%, Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20%, and triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> when it hits an enemy.
4.Lore:
The girl I saw through the narrow vent shone like she'd stepped right out of a fairytale.
She was the real princess — and I was just a prisoner.
Lord, she has so much already... would it be so wrong if I had just a tiny bit of it too?
That's when the hairpin silently fell.

5.Title: Dreams of a Fading Winter
5.Lore:
The day the TOPS executives and the Inspection Team arrived, she and Manato had just returned from school. Their airship had to circle overhead for ages, waiting for a place to land because the guests' vehicles took priority. Sweating as they hurried across the skybridge, they passed just above a throng of reporters surrounding the guests. That's when she spotted the girl. That night, she had a dream: it was her being swarmed by reporters, walking that same path under the bridge. And at the end of it... stood a throne, waiting just for her.
It had been a long time since she'd had a dream like that. She got up for a drink of water, replaying the words she'd overheard during the day: "A so-called expert Inspection Team, and they've got some rich girl tagging along just for show!"
"Kama, Kama!" She cracked open the window and whispered. A fuzzy little face popped up instantly from outside. "I've got a great idea. Tomorrow night... let's go do something fun."

6.Title: Put Down Roots
6.Description: Gain 1 additional <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color> when successfully parrying an enemy attack using a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak</color>. When using <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to charge for up to 0.8 seconds. Releasing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or reaching full charge fires an extra powerful shell at the enemy. For every 0.4s charged, Yuzuha consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Point</color> to fire an additional powerful shell, each dealing 300% of her ATK as <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. If any powerful shell from <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color> hits an enemy, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG Multiplier increases by 105% for 40s, and stacking up to 3 times, with each stack duration being calculated separately. In addition, if the powerful shell hits an enemy under <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color>, it'll trigger 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> attack. If Yuzuha is attacked while charging, she will automatically dodge the attack and immediately unleash the max-charged attack.
6.Lore:
The night the hearing ended, Baorong said they should celebrate Kaede getting a scholarship, so Mystic Wares closed early and the whole family went to Yum Cha Sin.
During the meal, her brother called from the far-off Faunus Quarter to offer his congratulations. While Sumire and A-Wen animatedly recounted the day's events: a calico cat at school had lost her kitten, and no one could find it — until, miraculously, it came back on its own at noon.
On the phone, her brother sighed, "A-Wen, every time I ask about your grades, you change the subject. If Dad and Yuzuha won't say anything, then I will!"
Everyone laughed — except Baorong, who just kept murmuring, "It came back, that's what matters... that it came back..."

DescriptionByLevel.1:
Upon entering the battlefield, Yuzuha immediately gains 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
Yuzuha can have up to 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
When Yuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert, Right Now!</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Surrender or Suffer the Mischief</color> hits an enemy, all squad members receive the <color=#FFFFFF>Tanuki Wish</color> effect.
<color=#FFFFFF>Tanuki Wish</color> grants an ATK increase equal to 40% of Yuzuha's initial ATK, up to a maximum increase of <color=#2BAD00>600</color>, and increases the DMG dealt by those with the effect by 15%, lasting 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
If Yuzuha's initial ATK reaches 1,500, she grants the full ATK bonus to all squad members.

Upon entering the battlefield, Yuzuha immediately gains 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
Yuzuha can have up to 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
When Yuzuha's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert, Right Now!</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Surrender or Suffer the Mischief</color> hits an enemy, all squad members receive the <color=#FFFFFF>Tanuki Wish</color> effect.
<color=#FFFFFF>Tanuki Wish</color> grants an ATK increase equal to 40% of Yuzuha's initial ATK, up to a maximum increase of <color=#2BAD00>700</color>, and increases the DMG dealt by those with the effect by 15%, lasting 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
If Yuzuha's initial ATK reaches 1,750, she grants the full ATK bonus to all squad members.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: The More the Merrier
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
If Yuzuha's Anomaly Mastery exceeds 100, every point over increases the Anomaly Buildup Rate of characters with <color=#FFFFFF>Tanuki Wish</color> by <color=#2BAD00>0.2%</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>, and all Attribute Anomaly DMG and <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG by <color=#2BAD00>0.2%</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>. When Yuzuha's Anomaly Mastery is at 200, she grants the full buff effect.

141100001.Title: Basic Attack: Tanuki Claws
141100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 strikes ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

141100002.Title: Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak
141100002.Description:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Enter a defensive stance for up to 1.5 seconds. If hit during this time, parry the attack and inflict massive Daze against the attacking enemy.
Successfully parrying an attack gains 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
Character is invulnerable when successfully parrying.

141100003.Title: Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot
141100003.Description:
When Yuzuha has <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>, landing a hit with other active characters' attacks will have Yuzuha continuously twirl her umbrella and attack centered around the target before launching a powerful shell, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. When this attack lands a heavy attack, Yuzuha consumes 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Point</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot</color> is considered an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot</color> can be triggered once every 8s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100004.Title: Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles
141100004.Description:
Enemies under the effect of <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> will be attacked by a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> once every 1s.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> initially deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> does not contribute its accumulated Attribute Anomaly Buildup toward Anomaly DMG calculation.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:0.07+AvatarSkillLevel(0)*0.015,100,4}%</color>.

141100005.Title: Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max
141100005.Description:
Enemies affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> will be attacked by a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> when hit with a heavy attack from <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Hard Candy Shot</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> initially deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> does not contribute its accumulated Attribute Anomaly Buildup toward Anomaly DMG calculation.
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:0.07+AvatarSkillLevel(0)*0.015,100,4}%</color>.

141100006.Title: Basic Attack: Tanuki Helper
141100006.Description:
When Yuzuha is off-field, tanuki Kama assists the active character in attacking enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When Yuzuha performs <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak</color>, tanuki Kama joins her in attacking the enemy, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Tanuki Kama inherits Yuzuha's initial ATK.

141100044.Description: Tanuki Kama & Yuzuha Coordinated Attack DMG Multiplier

141100007.Title: Special Attack: Gummy Bombardment
141100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Fire a cannon shot forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

141100008.Title: EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert
141100008.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Throw a bomb at the enemy, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Upon hitting an enemy with a heavy attack, it inflicts the <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state.
Gains 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color> upon activation.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100009.Title: EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert, Right Now!
141100009.Description:
After using <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter: Time for Payback~</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist: Dessert Time</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: We Have Cookies</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot</color>, or when a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> is triggered, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Quickly throw a bomb at the enemy, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
On hitting an enemy with a heavy attack, it inflicts the <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state.
Gains 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color> upon activation.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100010.Title: Sweet Scare
141100010.Description:
The <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state lasts for <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:16+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*2,1,2}</color>s, repeated triggers reset the duration.
When an enemy affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> is first hit by an active character using an attack of their attribute, <color=#FFFFFF>Flavor Match</color> is triggered against that enemy, changing the attribute of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> against that enemy to match that of the character who triggered Flavor Match.
When <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> is triggered again on an enemy, their existing <color=#FFFFFF>Flavor Match</color> state is removed. The process can be repeated to change the attribute of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Sugarburst Sparkles - Max</color> again.

141100053.Title: EX Special Attack: Cavity Alert, Right Now!

141100011.Title: Dodge: Did I Scare You?
141100011.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100012.Title: Dash Attack: You're Outta Luck!
141100012.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Rapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

141100013.Title: Dodge Counter: Time for Payback~
141100013.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Deliver a quick strike forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100014.Title: Chain Attack: Prank Assault
141100014.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleash a powerful strike on enemies in a small area ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Gains 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color> when used.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100015.Title: Ultimate: Surrender or Suffer the Mischief
141100015.Description:
When Decibel Rating reaches Maximum, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to trigger:
Unleash a powerful strike on enemies in a large area around the character, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Enemies hit with a heavy attack are inflicted with the <color=#FFFFFF>Sweet Scare</color> state.
Upon activating this skill, other squad members gain <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:7+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*1.5,1,2}</color> Energy.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
A <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100068.Title: Ultimate: Surrender or Suffer the Mischief

141100017.Title: Quick Assist: Dessert Time
141100017.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100018.Title: Defensive Assist: Replenish Your Fun
141100018.Description:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Upon a successful parry, gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Sugar Points</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100019.Title: Assist Follow-Up: We Have Cookies
141100019.Description:
After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or successfully parrying an enemy attack with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100020.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot
141100020.Description:
After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or successfully parrying an enemy attack with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Tanuki Cloak</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> at the right moment to activate:
Following a continuous spinning umbrella attack, fire a powerful projectile that deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

141100082.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Stuffed Hard Candy Shot
